mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL WHERE PERFORMANCE_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INQUIRY WHERE INQUIRY_DEL_FL = 'N' AND REPLY_IS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CONCERT_MANAGER WHERE CONCERT_MANAGER_DEL_FL = 'N'
